page.title: 13EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The main source of local employment is farming which could also be classified as the area's main industry. I suspect that the rate of unemployment is as high here as anywhere else.The majority of people living in this area are employed in Eastbourne, Brighton, Lewes and in London. Some sources of employment as advertised in the local paper are:-Dental surgeon's assistant wanted; bar staff required for nightclub and paper boys and girls wanted; receptionist wanted for busy dental surgery. Many of the local people are self employed working as sellers of home produced fruits and vegetables up to running their own farms.
